thread.title: Alfredo Ponce
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Alfredo Ponce

author: Alfredo Ponce
title: Alfredo Ponce
text: My wife called to get information from Public Storage and she said that the person that answered named Johnny was very helpful, polite and was able to answered all her questions. We went to the office and the young lady named Maria was also very polite, helpful and helped us decide what to get. Now we are using Public Storage and we are very happy with it! We are happy employees like Johnny and Maria work at Public Storage.
